title: Classic Scrambled Eggs
description: Fluffy, creamy scrambled eggs cooked to perfection. A timeless breakfast classic that's simple yet satisfying.
instructions: Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk with milk, salt, and pepper
Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium-low heat
Pour in egg mixture and let sit for 30 seconds
Gently stir with a spatula, pushing eggs from edges to center
Continue stirring gently until eggs are just set but still creamy
Remove from heat and serve immediately

title: Simple Tomato Pasta
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich tomato sauce, fresh basil, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook pasta according to package directions
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat
Add minced garlic and saut√© for 1 minute until fragrant
Add canned tomatoes, breaking them up with a spoon
Season with salt and pepper, simmer for 10-15 minutes
Drain pasta and toss with tomato sauce
Serve topped with fresh basil and parmesan cheese

title: Chicken Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy chicken stir fry loaded with colorful vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat
Add chicken and cook until golden, about 5 minutes
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds
Add harder vegetables (carrots, broccoli) first, stir fry 3 minutes
Add bell peppers and stir fry 2 more minutes
Pour in soy sauce and toss everything together
Garnish with green onions and serve over rice

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with homemade Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Toss bread cubes with olive oil and bake at 400¬∞F for 10 minutes for croutons
In a large bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, lemon juice, Worcestershire, and garlic
Add chopped romaine lettuce to the bowl
Toss lettuce with dressing until well coated
Top with grated parmesan and homemade croutons
Serve immediately while croutons are still crispy

title: Banana Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes with mashed banana mixed right into the batter for natural sweetness.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt
In another bowl, combine mashed bananas, milk, egg, and melted butter
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until just combined
Heat a griddle or large pan over medium heat and lightly grease
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake onto hot griddle
Cook until bubbles form on surface, then flip and cook until golden
Serve warm with maple syrup and sliced bananas

title: Beef Tacos
description: Seasoned ground beef in soft tortillas topped with fresh vegetables and cheese.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with 1/4 cup water
Simmer for 5 minutes until thickened
Warm tortillas in microwave or dry skillet
Fill each tortilla with seasoned beef
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream
Serve immediately with lime wedges

title: Vegetable Soup
description: Hearty and nutritious vegetable soup packed with seasonal vegetables in a flavorful broth.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat
Saut√© onion, carrots, and celery until softened, about 5 minutes
Add potatoes and vegetable broth, bring to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes until potatoes are tender
Add green beans and corn, cook 5 more minutes
Season with Italian herbs, salt, and pepper
Serve hot with crusty bread

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies that are crispy on the edges and soft in the center.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375¬∞F and line baking sheets with parchment
Cream together butter and both sugars until light and fluffy
Beat in eggs one at a time, then vanilla
In separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt
Gradually mix dry ingredients into wet ingredients
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto baking sheets
Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown around edges

title: Greek Salad
description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onion in a large bowl
Add kalamata olives and cubed feta cheese
In small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, and oregano
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Let marinate for 10 minutes before serving
Serve chilled as a side dish or light lunch

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Golden, crispy grilled cheese sandwich with melted cheese between buttered bread slices.
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice
Place cheese between bread slices with buttered sides facing out
Heat a skillet over medium-low heat
Place sandwich in skillet and cook 3-4 minutes until golden
Flip carefully and cook another 3-4 minutes
Remove when both sides are golden and cheese is melted
Cut diagonally and serve immediately

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: Comforting chicken noodle soup with tender chicken, vegetables, and egg noodles in savory broth.
instructions: In large pot, bring chicken broth to boil with bay leaves
Add chicken breasts and simmer 20 minutes until cooked through
Remove chicken, let cool, then shred into bite-sized pieces
Add carrots, celery, and onion to broth, simmer 10 minutes
Add egg noodles and cook according to package directions
Return shredded chicken to pot with thyme
Season with salt and pepper, remove bay leaves before serving

title: Avocado Toast
description: Simple yet delicious avocado toast topped with a sprinkle of salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
instructions: Toast bread slices until golden brown
Cut avocado in half, remove pit, and scoop flesh into a bowl
Mash avocado with fork, leaving some chunks for texture
Mix in lemon juice, salt, and black pepper
Spread avocado mixture evenly on toast
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes if desired
Serve immediately while toast is still warm

title: Beef Stew
description: Hearty beef stew with tender chunks of beef, potatoes, and vegetables in a rich gravy.
instructions: Heat oil in large pot and brown beef cubes on all sides
Remove beef and saut√© onions until softened
Stir in flour and tomato paste, cook 1 minute
Gradually add beef broth and Worcestershire sauce
Return beef to pot, bring to boil then reduce heat
Cover and simmer 1.5 hours until beef is tender
Add potatoes and carrots, cook 30 more minutes until vegetables are tender

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh Italian salad with sliced tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.
instructions: Arrange alternating slices of tomato and mozzarella on a platter
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper
Let sit at room temperature for 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld
Serve as an appetizer or light lunch
Best enjoyed within an hour of preparation

title: French Toast
description: Classic French toast with a golden, custardy exterior and soft interior, perfect for weekend mornings.
instructions: Whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, and sugar in shallow dish
Heat butter in large skillet over medium heat
Dip each bread slice in egg mixture, coating both sides
Cook in skillet 2-3 minutes per side until golden brown
Keep cooked slices warm in 200¬∞F oven while finishing batch
Serve hot with maple syrup and fresh berries
Dust with powdered sugar if desired

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian risotto with saut√©ed mushrooms and parmesan cheese, stirred to perfection.
instructions: Saut√© mushrooms in 1 tbsp butter until golden, set aside
Heat olive oil in large pan, cook onion until translucent
Add garlic and rice, stir for 2 minutes until rice is coated
Pour in wine and stir until absorbed
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
Continue until rice is creamy and tender, about 20 minutes
Stir in mushrooms, remaining butter, and parmesan
Serve immediately while hot and creamy

title: Fish Tacos
description: Light and fresh fish tacos with crispy white fish, cabbage slaw, and creamy lime sauce.
instructions: Season fish with cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper
Heat oil in skillet and cook fish 4-5 minutes per side
Break fish into bite-sized pieces when cooked through
Mix cabbage with lime juice and cilantro for slaw
Combine mayonnaise with remaining lime juice for sauce
Warm tortillas in dry skillet or microwave
Fill tortillas with fish, cabbage slaw, and lime sauce
Serve with lime wedges and hot sauce

title: Meatball Spaghetti
description: Classic spaghetti and meatballs with homemade meatballs in a rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Mix ground beef, breadcrumbs, egg, onion, and Italian seasoning for meatballs
Form mixture into 1.5-inch meatballs
Brown meatballs in large skillet on all sides
Add marinara sauce and simmer 20 minutes
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package directions
Add garlic to sauce in last 5 minutes of cooking
Serve meatballs and sauce over spaghetti
Garnish with grated parmesan cheese

title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: Crispy chicken Caesar salad wrapped in a flour tortilla for a portable, satisfying lunch.
instructions: Grill or cook chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing and parmesan
Warm tortillas slightly to make them more pliable
Place lettuce mixture in center of each tortilla
Top with sliced chicken, cherry tomatoes, and crushed croutons
Fold bottom edge up, then fold sides in and roll tightly
Cut in half diagonally and secure with toothpicks if needed

title: Apple Pie
description: Classic homemade apple pie with flaky crust and cinnamon-spiced apple filling.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425¬∞F
Mix sliced apples with sugar, flour, cinnamon, and nutmeg
Place bottom pie crust in 9-inch pie pan
Fill with apple mixture and dot with butter pieces
Cover with top crust and crimp edges to seal
Cut several vents in top crust
Brush top with beaten egg for golden color
Bake 45-50 minutes until crust is golden and filling bubbles
Cool completely before slicing
